name: CLIMMAR -
goal: CLIMMAR is the European umbrella organisation representing several (currently 16) national (dealer) associations in the agricultural machinery and equipment sector. It represents and promotes the interests of the member associations on a European level by co-ordinating the views of the national associations and their members. It provides know-how of the sector to the European institutions and other organisations. It also informs members about the latest developments in related European legislation.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Institutional affairs, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
Industrial Policy and Internal Market:
"Mother" regulation 167/2013:
- EU type approval of agricultural vehicles
- Repair and Maintenance Information (RMI)
EU road safety rules for agricultural Non Road Mobile Machines (NRMMs)

Development Policy:
Global Food Security
